description: Customer perception themes from reviews, NPS verbatims, and market research

entries.summary: Users consistently praise UI/UX as miles ahead of incumbent banks
entries.sampleVerbatim: The app design is so clean compared to DBS or OCBC

entries.summary: Account freezes without notice cause severe trust damage and negative reviews
entries.sampleVerbatim: My account was frozen with no warning and support took weeks to resolve

entries.summary: Users find GXB simple and user-friendly compared to traditional banks
entries.sampleVerbatim: Simple and easy. Best experience so far.

entries.summary: IC capture failures, OTP not received, registration errors blocking new users
entries.sampleVerbatim: Cannot proceed to capture back side of IC. Should be no star given.
